commands.name: az webpubsub custom-certificate create
commands.summary: Create a custom certificate of WebPubSub Service.
examples: az webpubsub custom-certificate create --webpubsub-name MyWebPubSub -g MyResourceGroup --certificate-name MyCertificate --key-vault-base-uri https://myvault.vault.azure.net/ --key-vault-secret-name MySecret --key-vault-secret-version 8d35338681be4cf09b97e899cb7179b8

commands.name: az webpubsub custom-certificate delete
commands.summary: Delete a custom certificate of WebPubSub Service.
examples: az webpubsub custom-certificate delete --webpubsub-name MyWebPubSub -g MyResourceGroup --certificate-name MyCertificate

commands.name: az webpubsub custom-certificate list
commands.summary: List custom certificates of WebPubSub Service.
examples: az webpubsub custom-certificate list --webpubsub-name MyWebPubSub -g MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az webpubsub custom-certificate show
commands.summary: Show the detail of a custom certificate of WebPubSub Service.
examples: az webpubsub custom-certificate show --webpubsub-name MyWebPubSub -g MyResourceGroup --certificate-name MyCertificate
